Articles.Content:
Just an idea, but I hope this spark will turn into a flame. I encourage modders to avoid using Curse and putting their mods there. ATM there are 7 mods only, and 2 are worthy.

If you keeps mods here, on the forum, Squad will realize Curse was a bad idea from the start.

Please don't lock this, and only say that you are joining the strike. No discussion please.

...

You haven't even seen how its going to be yet, you never know.

Besides, this thread is gonna get locked, so might as well break your rule!

Just an idea, but I hope this spark will turn into a flame. I encourage modders to avoid using Curse and putting their mods there. ATM there are 7 mods only, and 2 are worthy.

If you keeps mods here, on the forum, Squad will realize Curse was a bad idea from the start.

Please don't lock this, and only say that you are joining the strike. No discussion please.

I hope the same, i hate curse: long life the old good spaceport!
I'm up for it! WE HATE CURSE! WE HATE CURSE! THIS IS A CURSE!

http://spaceport.kerbalcentral.com coming to a fansite near you.

Can I get coding volunteers? Let's get a team together to make it happen.
There's already a main Curse thread in general. Sorry, iDan. Locked.
